item.title: 0025.reverse-nodes-in-k-group
item.description: 1func reverseKGroup(head *ListNode, k int) *ListNode { 2 var innerReverseKGroup func(h *ListNode) *ListNode 3 innerReverseKGroup = func(h *ListNode) *ListNode { 4 cur := h 5 i := 0 6 var prev *ListNode 7 for i = 0; i < k && cur != nil; i++ { 8 prev = cur 9 cur = cur.Next 10 } 11 if i < k { 12 return h 13 } 14 // prev是上一个链的末尾 15 prev.
